Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: People are praising the 2023 Australian budget for providing targeted cost of living relief to those doing it tough with increased investment in healthcare education housing and water promising to deliver a better future for Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Australians. Language and details are inclusive in acknowledgement of how listening to First Nations voices and putting equality for women at the centre of the budget can help ensure no one's left behind. A concern for those in the community who are struggling financially has been addressed while progress towards closing the gap offers hope for a brighter future for all Australians.
